document.full_text: jo-jo reyes won for the first time in 29 starts by throwing his first career complete game and jayson nix hit a two-run homer to lead the host toronto blue jays to an 11-1 win over the cleveland indians on monday night.
document.title: roundup: staying for finish, toronto's reyes ends winless streak at 28
lines_and_colors: jo-jo reyes won for the first time in 29 starts by throwing his first career complete game and jayson nix hit a two-run homer to lead the host toronto blue jays to an 11-1 win over the cleveland indians on monday night.
